sentence.Network_en: Too often people sat stolidly watching the noisy little fiddler.
sentence.Network_cn: 人们往往不动声色地坐在那里,瞧着这位瘦小的提琴手闹腾一番.

sentence.Network_en: He dropped into a chair and sat looking stolidly at the floor.
sentence.Network_cn: 他坐在椅子上,两眼呆呆地望着地板.

sentence.Network_en: He of the black gown again emerged from the shadows and paced stolidly on behind her.
sentence.Network_cn: 黑大衫的汉子又从路旁闪出来,紧跟在后面.

auth_sentence.content: The small blank eyes mooned stolidly at me...it was like being gaped at by the village idiot.

auth_sentence.content: He stolidly accepted his loveless marriage as the price he must pay for his gains.
